incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking, giving undue pleasure to my palate?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Have you overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, demonstrating an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejecting the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an attachment to worldly pleasures that rejects the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I used excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs, thereby recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my essential expenses or family obligations
prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked my resources for leisurely pursuits, allowing them to take precedence over my essential expenses or family obligations?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

for my own entertainment or pride
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations or online interactions, for my own entertainment or pride?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I used my words to criticize, judge, or belittle others' private lives, even if what I said was true?

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided due to its holy character , thus showing disregard for God 's day of rest
impiety.question: Did I engage in work on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided due to its holy character, thus showing disregard for God's day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

anger.question: Have I nursed anger in my heart, rather than seeking peace and reconciliation, especially when interactions with others have been strained or difficult due to mobility issues or health concerns?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

anger.question: Have I nursed anger in my heart towards those closest to me, such as friends, family members, or neighbors, rather than striving for reconciliation?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
